code: import React from'react';import style from'./style.module.scss';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var CreateToDo=function CreateToDo(_ref){var inputToDoName=_ref.inputToDoName,setInputToDoName=_ref.setInputToDoName,toDoList=_ref.toDoList;var data=new Date();var monthShortNames=['Jan','Feb','Mar','Apr','May','Jun','Jul','Aug','Sep','Oct','Nov','Dec'];var createToDo=function createToDo(){if(inputToDoName){var todo={name:inputToDoName,time:"".concat(data.getDate(),"/").concat(monthShortNames[data.getMonth()],"/").concat(data.getFullYear(),"/").concat(data.getHours(),":").concat(data.getMinutes()>=10?data.getMinutes():"0".concat(data.getMinutes())),id:new Date().getTime(),description:'',isActive:false};toDoList.push(todo);localStorage.setItem('ToDos',JSON.stringify(toDoList));setInputToDoName('');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:style.main,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{action:"#",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Write what to do",value:inputToDoName,required:true,onChange:function onChange(e){return setInputToDoName(e.target.value);}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:createToDo,type:"submit",children:"Create"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"TODOs: ".concat(toDoList.length)})]})});};export default CreateToDo;
